title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Mark.

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: pan.

text: The two lads were students at the Universal Electrical and
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Chemical College.  They stood high in their classes, and were
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: often allowed to conduct experiments on their own responsibility,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: this being one of those occasions.  Jack, who was somewhat older
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: than his companion, was of a more adventurous turn of mind, and
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: was constantly trying new things.  Not always safe ones, either,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: for often he had produced small explosions in the laboratory of
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the college.  Only minor damage had been done thus far, but, as
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: in case you prove that your theory is right, and that you can
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: no satisfying you.  You're too particular, Mark."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

text: The two lads, whom some of my readers have met before in the

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: his cruel employers, and, unknown to each other previously, had

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The train, as told in the first volume to this series, called
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Through the Air to the North Pole," was wrecked near a place
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: where a certain Professor Amos Henderson, and his colored helper,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: who was constantly building new wonderful machines.  He was
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: wreck.  He and Washington White carried the lads to the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: inventor's workshop, and there the boys recovered.  When they
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: were well enough, the professor invited them to live with him,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They went, in company with Washington and an old hunter, named
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: help him.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Many adventures befell the party.  They had battles with wild
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: beasts in the far north, and were attacked by savage Esquimaux.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Once they were caught in a terrible storm. They actually passed
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Henderson made some interesting scientific observations.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: In the second volume of this series, entitled "Under the Ocean to
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the South Pole," Professor Henderson, Jack, Mark, Washington and
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: old Andy Sudds, made even a more remarkable trip.  The professor
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: had a theory that there was an open sea at the South Pole, and he
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: wanted to prove it.  He decided that the best way to get there
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: was to go under the ocean in a submarine boat, and he and the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: capable of being propelled under water at a great depth.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The voyagers had rather a hard time of it.  They were caught in a
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: great sea of Sargasso grass, monstrous suckers held the boat in
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: immense arms, and it required hard fighting to get free.  The
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: boys and the others had the novel experience of walking about on
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the professor.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: On their journey to the South Pole, the adventurers came upon a
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: and had a glimpse of unfathomable depths.  They passed on, but
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: could not forget the strange hole in the island.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Mark suggested that it might lead to the center of the earth,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: which is hollow, according to some scientists, and after some
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: consideration, Professor Henderson, on his return from the South
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Pole, decided to go down the immense shaft.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: To do this required a different kind of vessel from any he had
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: yet built.  He would need one that could sail on the water, and
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: yet float in the air like a balloon or aeroplane.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: How he built this queer craft and took a most remarkable voyage,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: you will find set down in the third book of this series, entitled
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Five Thousand Miles Underground."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: In their new craft, called the Flying Mermaid, the professor, the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: boys, Washington and Andy, sailed until they came to the great
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: descended through clouds of vapor.  After many perils they
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of beings.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: had been prepared for this emergency, and he had built a strong
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: cylinder, into which all the travelers placed themselves.  Then
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: but came safely out of it.

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: and they were rescued by a passing vessel.  Of course, they had
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: and Chemical College.  Each had an ambition to become as great an
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: inventor as was Professor Henderson, with whom they continued to
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

text: face of a man staring in.

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: voice:

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I saw the face," added Mark.  "It was a man looking in."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "A man?  What sort of a man?" inquired Mr. Roumann, and he showed
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: some excitement.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: a second.  But the man was looking right in."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: strode rapidly toward the window.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: smooth-shaven.  I'm sure of that."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: one who has been trying to discover my secret.  But the man whom
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: had none?"
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Then it's all right."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: wandering about looking for a chicken coop that isn't locked.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: face, he did not believe the fellow was a tramp.  There was too
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: much intelligence shown.  The face was an evil one, and seemed to
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: indicate that the man had an object in peering into the window--a
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: motive that was not connected with a chicken coop.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I'll tell Andy to keep watch for a while tonight with his gun,"
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: went on the professor. "I don't like prowlers around here.  I
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: have some valuable tools in my machine shop, and they might steal
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: them."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: his seat at a small table and spread out his plans in front of
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: him, "I am only going to sketch briefly, for you and your young
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: assistants, what I propose.  As I have said, we will need a
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: projectile, two hundred feet long and about ten feet through in
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the thickest part.  In that we will build sleeping and living
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: apartments, lacks to store the air which we will have to breathe
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: while traveling through space, other tanks for water, a
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: compartment for food, another for scientific instruments, and we

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: will need a comparatively large space for my machinery."

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Why will it take up so much space?" asked the professor.  "I
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: thought you said the new power required only a small machine to
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "That is true, but you see we will have to carry two kinds of
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: machines."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Because we are going to travel through two, and perhaps three,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of the earth; then through the vast region beyond that, filled

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "And is that different from our atmosphere?" asked Mark.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: So that is why I need so much space for machinery."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: are many things to do when we reach there."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I shall be much interested in seeing if they have discovered a
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: way of conquering the air," said Mr. Henderson.  "If they are a
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: race of superior intelligence, as some authorities believe, from
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: machines--would be one of the surest tests."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I think you will find the Martians a very learned race,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: professor," said Mr. Roumann.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: playing baseball, football and so on," marked Jack.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: great canals of Mars."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I believe there will be plenty to interest us on the planet
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: which glows so red at night," went on Mr. Henderson.  "But, Mr.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I must say no more now," he added, calming himself by a strong
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: effort.  "Sufficient to state that you will never regret making
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the trip to the wonderful planet."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Yes, and I will do so."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: wonderful."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

text: craft.

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: fascinated, at the swiftly moving needle of the gage that had
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: very little about the composition of comets.  They may be
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

text: some vast, blazing world, as large as our planet.  In fact,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I'm afraid so."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: dat's what I hopes."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "We're a great deal more likely to be knocked out ourselves,

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Wash."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: busted all t' pieces."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: two scientists began to consult.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "We have decided on a plan, Mr. Henderson and myself," said Mr.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Roumann.  "The fact that so little is certainly known concerning
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: comets makes it difficult to know what to do.  We might keep on
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: we might strike the solid head of it, for that the head is solid,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: and of a glowing, fiery mass, which gives off a train of sparks,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: through the less dense part the tail of the comet."

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Jack.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: and have ascertained that this is Donati's comet--the one of 1858--and
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: entirely beyond it would consume much time.  In fact, we could not move
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: course toward the comet."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "How far off is it now?" asked Mark.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "About seven hundred and twenty thousand miles."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: a rapid calculation.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: commented Jack.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "We all do," observed Mr. Henderson.  "But now, boys, we are
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: going to do our best to escape.  Mr. Roumann will remain in the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

text: to the Etherium, motor."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Try and see if you can get any more speed out of it," advised
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the German.  "Use the accelerator plates, as I instructed you.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: portion of it, that we shall not be harmed."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: only hope."

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: comet and will not work."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: would.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: he said.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: house.

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Roumann solemnly.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: dollars?"
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "What is that?"
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Well, I can't go into details now, but I hope to secure

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: fear."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "What is that?"

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: going to borrow trouble.  Let us see how the motor is working."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

text: exclaimed:

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Nature or skill with suits that were a part of themselves.  Men,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: women and children were all attired alike.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Suddenly the travelers felt themselves come to a stop.  A murmur
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: arose from the crowd, and from the midst of the assemblage there
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: stepped forth a man, who seemed to be a sort of leader.  On his
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: head was a golden band, and attached to it was a small,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: glittering triangle.  He approached quite close to the little
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: party, and the boys noticed that he seemed to float along, rather
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: than to walk, and that his progress was very swift.  He looked
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: searchingly at the strangers with his big eyes, and then
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: addressed them in a queer language.  By the tones of his voice it
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: was easily guessed that he was asking them questions, and it did
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: not take much of an imagination to guess that he was inquiring
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: whence they came, how they had arrived, and what they wanted.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I can't understand his language," remarked Mr. Henderson,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: turning to his friends.  "Can any of you?"
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They all shook their heads.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Let me try him in German," suggested Mr. Roumann, and he gave a
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: brief explanation, in that language, of their trip from the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: earth.  The man with the glittering triangle on his head did not
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: comprehend.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I can speak several languages," remarked Amos Henderson.  "Let
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: me tackle him."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Accordingly, the professor spoke in several languages, including
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the Esquimau, which he had picked up on his journey north, and in
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the language used by the inhabitants in the center of the earth.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: But to all these the leader only shook his head.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Suppose we try Latin?" suggested Mark, who was a proficient
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: pupil in that language.  "Latin is a very old language.  Maybe he
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: understands that."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Go ahead," said Jack.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Mark accordingly began to recite part of the first book of
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Caesar, beginning: "All Gaul is divided into three parts," which
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: every schoolboy knows.  But this was no better.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Let me try a bit of Greek on him," said Mr. Roumann.  "I used to
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: be a pretty good Greek scholar."'
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: But Greek appeared to be an unknown tongue to Mars.  The leader,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: however, seeing that the strangers had arrived at the end of
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: their resources, called to some persons in the crowd, and these,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: coming forward, addressed the world-dwellers in different
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: dialects.  But they were no more understandable than had been the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: first speech of the man with the glittering triangle.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Guess we'll have to resort to first principles, and draw
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: pictures for them," said Mark.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Just then Jack uttered an exclamation, and pointed to the head of
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the leader.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "What's he doing?  Making faces at you?" asked Mark.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "No; but look at that triangle!" exclaimed Jack.  "It's a
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: right-angled one."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Well, what of it?"
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "This: If they understand triangles, they must know something
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: about mathematics and geometry.  Suppose we draw for them that
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: problem in geometry which states that the sums of the squares
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: constructed on the base and altitude of a right-angled triangle
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: is equal to the square constructed on the hypotenuse?  If he
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: knows that, maybe we can get to some understanding with him."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Go ahead and try," assented Mr. Henderson.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Jack accordingly took up a stick, and drew in the sand the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: geometrical problem of which he had spoken.  It is one of the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: simplest.  No sooner had he done so than the Martians set up a
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: cry.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "What's the matter?" asked Jack.  "I hope I haven't made them
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: mad."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "No; they appear to be delighted," said Mr. Roumann.  And sure
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: enough, the Martians showed evidences of pleasure.  They pointed
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to the triangle on the head of their leader, and then to the one
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Jack had drawn.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Then, from somewhere in the rear of the crowd, there came another
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: man.  He was slightly larger than his companions, but that was
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: not saying much, for, aside from their great heads, the Martians
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: were all little people, not much more than up to Andy's shoulder,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: and Andy was not much over five feet in height.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: But it was not the size of the newcomer that attracted the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: attention of the travelers so much as it was the device he had in
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the golden circle on his head.  For this device was exactly the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: same as the one Jack had drawn in the sand to illustrate the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: problem.  It was a triangle, with squares drawn out from the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: three sides.  He looked at the drawing in the sand, and made a
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: low bow to the newcomers.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Well, that appears to have taken their fancy," said Mark.  "I
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: can't understand it."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I can," spoke the professor quickly.  "The Martians are a very
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: learned people.  That's why their heads are so large and their
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: bodies so small.  They make a special study of the sciences, and
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: geometry and mathematics probably are their favorites.  That is
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: why they understand Jack's problem.  Science is the same
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: throughout the universe, though conditions may differ on
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: different planets.  I think we have arrived at a means of
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: communicating with the Martians, at least until we have learned
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: their language."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The Martian with the triangle and squares on his circlet of gold
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: appeared to be a grade higher in authority than the one with the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: simple triangle.  He now addressed the travelers, but they could
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: not understand him.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Seeing this, he stooped and drew in the sand another geometrical
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: problem, leaving it half completed.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "You finish it, Mark," said Jack, and the boy did so, much to the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: delight of the crowd.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "They all are well up in geometry," declared Mr. Roumann.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "But I'd like to understand what force it was that made us move?"
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: spoke Jack.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I'll see if I can find out," said Mr. Henderson, and he made
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: motions to indicate that they would like to know what power it
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: was that moved them away from the projectile.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: A smile came to the face of the leading Martian.  He pointed to
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: his big head, and then to the travelers.  Then he fixed his great
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: eyes on them.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Instantly they felt themselves being moved backward to the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: projectile.  They went a few feet, then were moved forward toward
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the crowd again.  Then they found themselves stationary.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "It's thought force!" cried Jack.  "That's what it is.  They
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: simply will for a thing to be done, and it is done--at least with
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: persons from another planet.  They have the power to make us move
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: by merely wishing it."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Then they ought to be able to read our thoughts," spoke Mark.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Maybe their power extends only to motion," suggested Mr.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Henderson.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The chief leader spoke again, and it was evident that he was
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: asking if the explanation and demonstration he had given was
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: satisfactory.  The professor nodded his head to indicate that it
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: was.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The leader addressed the throng of people, and they turned and
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: started away.  The leader remained, and turning to the adventurers
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: he pointed off toward a distant city, and indicated that they were
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to go there.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "And leave our projectile behind!" exclaimed Jack.  "We don't
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: want to do that."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: This did not meet with the approval of the others.  They were in
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: a strange land, and the Annihilator might be the means of saving
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: their lives.  If they left it there was no telling whether or not
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: they would ever see it again.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: As well as he could Mr. Henderson made motions that they did not
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: like to leave their craft behind.  But the Martian, with a frank
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: smile, seemed to say that it would be safe.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Guess we can't help ourselves," remarked Mr. Roumann.  "If we
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: don't go they'll make us.  Better go willingly.  Besides, I want
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to see their city."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "But what about our prisoner--the crazy machinist?" asked Jack.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Oh, I guess he will be all right.  He had a good meal just
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: before we landed, and he was asleep.  We'll go with these queer
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Roumann.  "Come on."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: went off at a rapid pace, and the travelers found themselves
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "This is a great way of traveling," observed Jack.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: projectile."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: rooster."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: said Mark.

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: At first glance Mars had not seemed to be much different from the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: earth they had left, but when the travelers had gotten over their

text: doubt that they warm their houses with it in winter.  A wonderful

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

text: turn.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They all stared at the strange sight.  It was rather odd to see
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the entire middle portion of the table going around, while the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: outer part, at which the adventurers sat, was stationary.  But
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the boys and men, with the exception of Washington, recognized it
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: as very convenient.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "What are you frightened at, Wash?" asked Jack.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "At dat table, dat's what!  It's a ghostest table."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "A ghost table?"
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Yep!  Spirits am workin' on it!  I ain't goin' t' stay heah.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: I'se goin' back t' de ship, where I kin move t'ings fo' mahself."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Don't be alarmed," said Mr. Henderson.  "It's all right,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Washington.  The table moves by some hidden mechanism, which
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: doubtless was set in motion by the Martian who were just here, or
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the mere sitting down to our places may have started it."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They all got up to make an examination, and the table center at
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: once ceased revolving, proving that some, connection existed
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: between it and the chairs.  But they could not discover the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: machinery.  There was a small metal box underneath the table, but
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: that was all.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "That must contain some of that marvelous red substance which
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: gives light, heat and power," declared Mr. Roumann.  "I must
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: certainly get a supply of it.  In fact, that is what I came to
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Mars for.  That is the object of my trip, and if we can get a
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: sufficient quantity of it, our fortunes are made."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Is it so valuable?" asked Mark.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "It is the most valuable treasure in the universe," replied the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: German.  "Long ago I suspected some such thing must exist on
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Mars, or else how, receiving only half the light and heat from
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the sun that we receive, can the inhabitants exist?  And that
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: they do live, and live well, we have seen.  It must be due to the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: red substance, and if we could only get some back to earth it
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: would be worth millions.  Think of simply putting a bit of it in
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: a stove and having heat, or hanging up some in a room and getting
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: light from it.  But, more than this, think of having it move
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: machinery,  I would not be surprised but what I could transform
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: it into energy that would operate the motors of the Annihilator."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "But wouldn't you need a new supply every once in a while?" asked
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Jack.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I think not.  I believe it is like radium, and will last
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: forever.  In fact, you notice that the metal boxes it is
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: contained in, except the ones in the boats, are securely sealed.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: If they had to be putting in a fresh supply every so often, they
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: would make the boxes so they would open more easily.  We must get
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: some of that treasure."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "But how?" inquired Mr. Henderson.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I don't know, but I will find out a way.  When we have been here
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: a few weeks we will be better acquainted with the Martians and
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: their language, and can make a search."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Well, if you folks is done talkin' about treasure, I'm goin' to
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: eat," observed old Andy.  "I'm hungry!"
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "So am I," added Jack, and as they all sat down again the table
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: began revolving.  They found it a convenient arrangement once the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: see about beds for the night, as the travelers were tired.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Well, Wash," asked Jack, as the colored man returned, "did you
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: find the beds making themselves, or waltzing around the room?"
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Nope, dey seemed t' be ordinary, respectable beds.  But I ain't
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: goin' t' take no chances in 'em.  I'se goin' t' sleep on de flo'."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Why?"
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "'Cause I don't want t' wake up in de middle ob de night an'
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: find mahself squashed inter a jellyfish.  I believe de beds am
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: bewitched same as de table is."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Nonsense," said Jack.  "They're all right.  This is a fine
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: place to live."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They found the beds good to sleep in, and nothing disturbed them.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Washington, however, stretched out on the floor, and he arose
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: early to prepare breakfast on the stove, which never needed to
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: By an arrangement of levers and valves the heat could be
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: increased or diminished at pleasure.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy
