title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: planet.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "We'll take a walk," suggested Mr. Roumann, "and maybe we can
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: find where they keep the red stuff, or where they get it from."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They strolled about the streets of Martopolis, noting many
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: strange sights.  The queer little people were hurrying to and
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: fro, with a peculiar gliding motion, much faster than the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: ordinary walk, yet it was not a run.  The peculiar lightness in
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: weight of everything on Mars probably accounted for this, as the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: travelers themselves found they could move about very swiftly,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: and with little fatigue.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Nor did the world-dwellers attract as much attention as they
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: expected they would.  The Martians appeared to have satisfied
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: their curiosity regarding the strangers the previous night, and
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: now gave them but passing glances.  Even the boys did not follow
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: them.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Every one seemed to be busy, and the travelers noted many
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: schools, in which the children were industriously studying,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: though it was early morning.  Observatories, with great
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: telescopes, were numerous, and astronomers were gazing at the sun
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: or different parts of the heavens, even in daylight.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "They are a very learned people, and they never seem to cease
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: from acquiring information," commented Mr. Henderson.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Well, I'd like to acquire some information about where that red
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: stuff is," said the German.  "There is one of the metal boxes
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: that contain some, up on that pole."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: He pointed to one that evidently served as a street lamp at
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: night.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "And there's a policeman near it," said Jack.  "Ask him."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: A Martian stood leaning against the light-pole, much as does an
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: officer of the law on earth.  That he was some sort of an
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: official was evidenced by the uniform he wore.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Mr. Roumann approached the Martian, and made signs that he would
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: like to see the light box.  The officer shook his head vigorously,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: and said something rapidly.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I guess they don't allow strangers to touch it," observed Jack.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Evidently not," admitted Mr. Roumann.  "I wonder if he knows
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: where it comes from?"
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: He made more signs, asking, as well as he could, where the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: substance in the box was obtained.  The officer pointed to the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: distant hills, but again shook his head in protest, and spoke for
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: tome time very earnestly, as if warning his questioner not to
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: venture after it.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Guess they must guard it pretty closely," said Mark.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Well, I'm going to have some, anyhow," declared the German.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "We'll take a stroll over toward the hills."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They passed through the city, no one offering to stop them.  On
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: every side they observed something new or strange, and they were
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: done silently.  There were no trolley cars, no wagons or trucks,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: no puffing automobiles, and no confusion.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: queer motive power, made no sound.  They seemed to be the only
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: vehicles in use, save the boats, and these sleds were of many
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: sizes, some as large as big trucks.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: asked Jack.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: bother with it.  In fact, they all seem too busy.  I want to get
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: some of that valuable red stuff."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of those boats."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: lake.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "There is where the treasure is--in those hills," said Mr.

text: and get some."

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: they were crossing it, there suddenly appeared from a little hut,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: about half way over, several Martians, who opposed their
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: progress.

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Well, I wonder if we can't go any farther?" asked Mr. Roumann,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: as he and his companions came to a halt, and noticed that the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: little men held what looked like small sticks in their hands.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "It seems as if they didn't want us to," observed Mr. Henderson.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Looks as if they were on guard."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Let me get at 'em with my gun," spoke Andy.  "I'll soon show
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Then he stopped suddenly, as he recalled how useless his firearm
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: was on Mars.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "You'll have to get some stronger powder, and heavier bullets, to
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: hunt here, Andy," said Jack.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I wonder if they have guns?" came from Mark.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "They only look like sticks," said Jack.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Mr. Roumann, by signs and motions, indicated that he and his
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: companions would like to travel along the narrow path to the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: hills.  The leading Martian, who was dressed like the officer at
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the lamp-post, while the others were less elaborately arrayed,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: shook his head.  His big mouth broke into a smile, however, as if
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: he wanted to be good-natured about it.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "He doesn't want us to go," said the professor.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Evidently not, but we're going just the same," retorted Mr.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Roumann.  "We're more than a match for twenty of these little
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: creatures, and there are only ten here.  Come on."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Do you think it will be safe?" inquired Mr. Henderson.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Of course.  They can't harm us."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The German scientist took a step forward.  The others were about
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to follow him when the leading Martian uttered a command, and his
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: men pointed their sticks at the travelers.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Look out!  Dey's goin' t' shoot!" exclaimed Washington, stooping
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: down.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "They can't shoot with those things," declared Mr. Roumann, for
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: there seemed to be no mechanism about the sticks.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They all pressed forward, but to their surprise it was just as if
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: they had met with an invisible stone wall.  They could not
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: advance a step farther.  They were halted by some strange power,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: and it appeared to come from the sticks, which the Martians kept
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: pointed at the strangers.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Why--why!  I can't seem to move!" cried Jack, pushing with all
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: his might.  But, though nothing could be seen in front of him or
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the others, they might just as well have tried to push over the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: glass castle in the public square.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "We can't go on," called Mr. Roumann.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The Martian officer said something to his men, and they lowered
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: their wands.  Instantly it was as if a stone wall had been taken
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: down from in front of the world-dwellers.  They were able to
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: advance a few steps, and then, when at a command the wands were
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: again pointed at them, they had to stop.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "It's those sticks!" cried Jack.  "They contain some strange
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: power.  That's the queerest kind of a policeman's club I ever
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: heard of.  It would keep back any mob!"
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Try as they did, they could not pass the invisible barrier, and
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: they were forced to give it up.  Seeing that the strangers
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: realized that they could not pass, the Martian officer and his
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: men lowered their sticks.  He spoke to the travelers, and, though
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: they could not understand what he said, it was evident from his
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: gestures that he was advising them to return to the city.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I think we'd better," said Mr. Henderson.  "The red substance is
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: too well guarded for us to get any of it.  Evidently they don't
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: want any of it taken away."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I must get it!" insisted Mr. Roumann.  "If not now, then later."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: There was nothing for them to do save turn back, and the Martians
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: tried to smile pleasantly at them, as if sorry for what they were
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: obliged to do.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "We'll go back to the projectile," decided Mr. Henderson.  "I am
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: a little anxious to see that it is all right."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They found that it was, though quite a throng had gathered about
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to inspect it.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Are we going to stay here, or go back to the house they let us
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: have?" asked Mark.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I think we will live in the city," decided Mr. Roumann.  "We can
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: learn more about the Martians there, begin to understand
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: something of their language, and be in a better position to get
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: some of that red stuff, than if we were out here.  But we'll go
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: inside and see about the crazy man, and also how the machinery
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: is.  I want to fix the motors so that if any one meddles with
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: them no damage will be done."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: It took some little time to adjust the machinery, and then the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: travelers took from their supplies some personal belongings,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: which they wished to have with them.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Now to see to that crazy machinist," said Mr. Henderson, when
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: they were ready to leave the projectile again.  "I wish we could
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: get rid of him.  He's a nuisance."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They went to the storeroom, where he had been confined, but the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: man was not there.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "He's hiding again," declared Jack.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "No; he's got away!" exclaimed Mr. Roumann.  "See, the ropes with
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: which we bound him have been broken.  When the Martians came out
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to feed him last night they could not have fastened them
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: securely.  Well, he's gone, and I don't know but what I'm glad of
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: it."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: But there came a time when they were all very sorry that the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: insane man had escaped, for he caused them much trouble.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: As they left the projectile to go to the house provided for them
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: in Martopolis, Mr. Roumann took with him several small iron
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: boxes.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "What are those for?" asked Jack.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "To put that red stuff in," replied the scientist.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I am going to make another try for some, but I'll take a
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: different road this time."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: For a week or more the travelers lived in their house in
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Martopolis.  They were courteously treated by the Martians, and
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: soon began to pick up the language, which was very simple when
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: once the principles of it were understood.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Several times the travelers were taken before the Great Council,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: as it was called, and asked in regard to matters on the world
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: they had left.  In turn the adventurers learned much about Mars.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Though it was much smaller than our earth, it was superior to it
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: in many ways.  One was the simplicity of life.  The Martians
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: never had any need of clothes, for they were born with fur and
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: feathers, which were renewed by Nature from time to time.  They
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: had to contend with a large quantity of water, which covered most
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of the surface of their planet, but by ingenious means they got
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: along nearly as well as if there was more land.  In science they
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: were far ahead of scientists of the earth, and they were
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: fortunate in possessing the red substance, which they called
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Cardite, and which was their only source of light, heat and
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: power.  With it they accomplished much that the world-dwellers
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: have to bring about by great labor.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: By inquiry, after they had learned the language, the travelers
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: found out that Cardite was regarded with much reverence, and
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: there was a tradition that if any of it was taken away from Mars,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the planet would disappear.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "No wonder they didn't want us to get any," said Mr. Roumann.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "But I'm going to have some, for all that.  It's all nonsense to
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: think any harm can come from taking it.  It will not injure their
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: planet, and it will be a fortune to us.  They must have a lot of
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: it, for they told us that all the cities on Mars, and there are
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: several of them, are lighted and heated by it."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "But how are you going to get it." asked Mark.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "By going a different route.  I'm going to get a boat, and go by
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: water.  I've found out how to run one of their boats by means of
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the red substance, and some day we'll sail over the lake to the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: hills and get some Cardite."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They waited another week, and, as they found less and less
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: attention was paid to them from day to day, they decided to make
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: an attempt to get some of the treasure.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They started one morning in a large boat, which Silex Corundum,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the ruler of Mars, had placed at their disposal, and in a short
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: time were approaching the distant hills, at the foot of which was
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the great lake.  The boat moved swiftly, the controlling
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: mechanism consisting of three little knobs on the outside of the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: box containing the Cardite.  One sent the craft forward, one
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: reversed it, and the other stopped it.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "We're almost there," said Mr. Roumann, after about an hour's
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: sail.  "There are no guards this way, just as I hoped.  We shall
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: soon be enormously wealthy."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Nearer and nearer came the boat to the hills.  When they were
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: within a half mile of them Jack, who was in the bow, uttered a
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: cry.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "A whirlpool!  A whirlpool!" he shouted.  "We're heading right
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: into it!"
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Mr. Roumann, who was steering, tried to turn the boat to one
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: side, but the craft would not answer the helm.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Shut off the power and reverse!" exclaimed Mr. Henderson, when
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: he saw that the boat was still rushing into the dangerous swirl
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of water.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Mark, who was near the metal box, did so.  But even the power of
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Cardite was of no avail against the awful suction of the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: whirlpool.  The boat began to go around in a great circle, ever
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: coming nearer and nearer to the black, swirling center.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "No wonder they needed no guards on the water side," gloomily
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: observed Mr. Roumann as he stood up and looked at the hills.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "The whirlpool is the best protector they could have."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: In deadly peril, the adventurers watched their boat coming nearer
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: and nearer to the terrible center of the angry waters.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: CHAPTER XXVII
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: GETTING THE CARDITE
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Isn't there any way of escape?" asked Jack in a low voice, as he
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: crouched in the bow and peered into the whirlpool, on the edge of
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: which they were circling.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I don't see any," replied Mr. Roumann.  "I am very sorry I got
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: you into this trouble.  If I had not insisted on coming for the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: red substance we would not be in this danger."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "It's as much our fault as yours," declared the professor.  "We
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: were anxious to get some of the treasure also."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "And now none of us will have any use for it," observed Andy
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: dryly.  "When we slide down into that hole it will be all up with
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: us."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They all shuddered as they saw the black hole, around which the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: waters raced in a circle.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I wonder what's down there?" asked Mark.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "It isn't a good thing to think about," responded Jack.  "I
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: always was afraid of whirlpools."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The boat was now beginning to go around faster.  The occupants
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: were getting dizzy with the motion.  They could hear a distant
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: roar, and knew that it came from the water falling down some
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: great depth, into which they seemed fated to be dashed.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Did you turn on all the power of the boat?" asked Jack after a
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: period of silence.  "Seems to me we didn't come along very fast
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: in this craft.  The one we were in first went at a great rate.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Maybe we don't understand how to make it go at top speed."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I turned the knobs every way I could think of," replied Mr.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Roumann.  "But it would take terrific speed and power to free us
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: from the suction of the whirlpool."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Jack moved back to the stern, where the box was, containing the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: red substance that furnished power to move the boat.  He looked
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: closely at it.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Meanwhile the boat was moving around in ever-narrowing circles,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: faster and faster.  Jack noticed that twice in each revolution it
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: went respectively lower and higher on the course, and always at
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the same places.  That is to say, the whirlpool was on what might
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: be termed a slant.  At one time the boat would be at the lowest
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: point, and at another at the highest point.  At the low point the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: occupants of the craft were out of sight of everything, as when a
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: ship is in the hollow of the sea.  A little later they would be
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: raised up on a crest of water so that they could look to the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: distant hills.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "If we could only get power enough to shoot the boat out at an
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: angle when it gets to the high point, we could escape," thought
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Jack.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: But how could he obtain this power?  The mechanism seemed to be
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: working at the greatest force, for, after an attempt had been
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: made to stay the progress of the boat by reversing it, Mr.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Roumann had again put on full speed ahead.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: But was it full speed?  That was what Jack wanted to know.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: He examined every inch of the box.  At first he saw nothing but
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the three knobs that had been used.  Then, all at once, down
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: underneath, he saw a small pin.  It looked as if it could be
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: moved.  He took hold of it.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I wonder what will happen if I pull it out or push it in?" he
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: asked himself.  Then he happened to remember that in an electric
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: battery, to obtain more power, you must pull out a certain pin.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Perhaps this works like an electric battery," he said.  "I'll
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: pull it out."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: He did so, and a surprising thing happened.  The boat shot
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: forward at enormous speed, and as Jack happened to pull the pin
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: out at a time when the craft was high up, it began to shoot
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: across the water at an angle to the whirlpool.  He had solved the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: problem of how to escape.  As he afterward learned, the pin was
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: just for the purpose for which he used it--to cause a sudden
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: increase in speed.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The whirlpool did not give up without a struggle, but the boat
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: was finally successful, and fought its way out to calm water.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "How did you do it?" asked Mark, and Jack told them.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Well, we'd better start back for the city," proposed Mr.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Roumann.  "I guess we've had enough for one day.  We'll try
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: again, and take some other route."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "There's no need of that," declared Professor Henderson. "See, we
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: are close to the hills now.  We have crossed the whirlpool.  Why
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: not go on, and see if we can't find some Cardite?  Going back now
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: will be no easier than after we have made an examination.  Let's
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: explore the hills."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The boat had shot out on the farther side of the whirlpool, and
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: there was nothing now between it and the shore.  After a
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: consultation it was decided to land.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "We can be more careful coming back," said Jack.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Half an hour later they had landed and started up the hills
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: toward the summit.  The place seemed to be deserted, but there
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: were evidences that some sort of mining had been going on there,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: for great holes and shafts were dug in the ground, and there were
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: remains of machinery.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "They must have dug up all the Cardite in this locality," said
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Professor Henderson, "and they've gone to a new place."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Which we wish to find," added Mr. Roumann, "and that without
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: being discovered.  From the way in which the Martians guard this,
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: it will go hard with us if they see us taking any."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They toiled up to the top of some of the lowest hills.  There did
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: not seem to be any of the treasure there, and they went farther.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They were getting tired and hungry, and they sat down to rest and
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: eat some food which they had brought with them.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Let's try that hill," proposed Mark, pointing to a high one
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: about a mile away.  "It looks red from here."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: There was a rosy hue about the little mountain, and after a brief
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: rest they headed for the spot.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "There's nothing here!" exclaimed Jack in disgust, as he and
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Mark, in a final spurt, reached the base of it.  "Nothing but
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: ordinary dirt."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Mark looked down. He dug his heel into the sod. Then he uttered a
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: cry of triumph.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Here it is!  Here it is!" he cried.  "It's under the grass!
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: We've got to dig it up!"
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: He knelt down, and began to tear away the sod with his hands.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Jack did the same, and when they had lifted aside the tangle of
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: roots and grass, they saw beneath it a dull gleaming red
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: substance, like clay.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "That's it!  That's it!" shouted Mr. Roumann.  "We've found it!"
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: He stooped over, and with his knife began digging some up.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "It's neither warm, nor does it give any light," said Mr.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Henderson in disappointed tones.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "No; it requires special electrical treatment," replied Mr.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Roumann.  "I know how to do it, though.  Now we shall all be
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: millionaires!  There is enough here to make us wealthy for life!"
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: He began filling his iron boxes, the rest helping him.  They were
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: engaged in getting out the Cardite, all working with feverish
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: haste, when Jack, looking up, saw a Martian officer regarding the
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: actions of the world-dwellers with his great, bulging eyes.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: CHAPTER XXVIII
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: THE ATTACK
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "They've discovered us!" exclaimed Jack, as he stood up and
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: watched the Martian.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "What?" cried Mr. Roumann.  "Oh, it's only one of them," he
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: added, "and he hasn't any of those electrical sticks.  Go ahead
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: and take some more of the Cardite."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: But the Martian advanced on the travelers, and, by his voice and
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: gestures, seemed to be warning them to stop taking the red
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: material.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Maybe he's a guard," suggested Mark.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Very likely," assented Professor Henderson.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I'll see if I can't scare him with my gun," remarked Andy.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I've put in more powder, and a heavier bullet."
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: He fired in the air, over the Martian's head, but to the surprise
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of the adventurers the weapon only gave a faint sound, like that
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of a pop gun, while the bullet rolled from the barrel and dropped
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: at Andy's feet.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Why, that's worse than ever!" he exclaimed.  "I guess the red
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: stuff must have taken all the power out of your gun, Andy," said
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Mark.
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The Martian stood still for a moment.  Then he spoke again, more
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: earnestly than before, and waved the strangers away from the red
title: Through Space to Mars; Or, the Longest Journey on Record
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: hill.

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "What do you mean?"
